thread.section_title: Bella Hadid Diet, Style, Height and Instagram Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: naked for V Magazine cover shoot
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid naked for V Magazine cover shoot | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.com
title: naked for V Magazine cover shoot
text:
Bella Hadid has only been a supermodel for a year, but she is not holding back when it comes to putting her body on display.
The 20-year-old younger sister of Vogue favorite Gigi Hadid stripped off her top for a very racy photo shoot with famed fashion photographer Mario Sorrenti for V Magazine .
The ex-girlfriend of The Weeknd looked saucy in the black-and-white photo session where she didn't try too hard to cover up her chest.
Awesomely au naturel: Bella Hadid, 20, took her clothes off for V Magazine, which is on newsstands March 9
V is for Va-Voom! The very racy photo shoot was with famed fashion photographer Mario Sorrenti
Peek-a-boob: Here the star gives a look of her chest
Bella did not appear to be wearing too much makeup for the lengthy and impressive portfolio.
And and her hair was not overstyled for the pared-down shoot that relied heavily on her generous curves and pretty face.
The Parsons School Of Design graduate failed to crack a smile as well.
V Magazine - the issue goes on sale March 9 - said the shoot was in a way playing homage to the 1990s Calvin Klein ad campaigns.
Those ads featured a very young Kate Moss, who Bella has been compared to.
In one image Hadid lets her right breast show as she lays down.
In another shot, she pulls her arm toward her center, flashing a sideboob.
And then there is the image of the former equestrian on her back with nothing but a skirt on.
Two pearl earrings are the only material item standing out in that luscious pose that looks like it could pass for a pinup poster.
In other shots, the star - who has been suffering from Lupus - is seen in more clothing but her figure is still the focus.
Chilly? In a stunning close-up portrait Bella looks to the side as her chest becomes the focus. The New York-based knockout has on a spaghetti strap black dress that is so plunging it shows off most of her stomach
Pensive: The sister of budding model Anwar Hadid opened her legs as she stared down
In a stunning close-up portrait Bella looks to the side as her chest becomes the focus.
The New York-based knockout has on a spaghetti strap black dress that is so plunging it shows off most of her stomach.
And it most certainly showed off her chest as the daughter of Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills vet Yolanda Foster, now Yolanda Hadid, went bra free for the arresting image.
But who's looking at her glam? Bella did not appear to be wearing too much makeup for the lengthy and impressive portfolio
So much to see: Hadid went both topless and in a lace top as she seemed to be yoga toned from head to toe
Get Bella's editorial look in a bustier by Alexander McQueen £3345 Alexander McQueen embroidered tulle bustier
Buy it here...
Buy now
Bella Hadid is no longer just the younger sister of Gigi.
She's forged a career all her own and has landed some major shows and campaigns along the way. From Victoria's Secret to Tag Heuer and Marc Jacobs to Givenchy, this girl is everywhere right now.
Including this spread for V Magazine in which she poses in a series of sultry shots in pieces by designers like Prada, Haider Ackermann and Chloé. And how stunning does she look in this embroidered bustier by Alexander McQueen?
From the brand's current collection its the ideal way to work the lingerie as outerwear trend that's so big at the moment. The good news is it's available to buy but the bad news is it'll set you back a cool £3345.
If you're feeling flush, however, then click (right) to buy it now or get the look for a lot less with our edit below. Whichever you choose, layer under a black blazer for a sexy take on tailoring or style it with jeans for a more laid back aesthetic.

The dark-haired siren has been a big hit on the runways at New York Fashion week.
The bedroom-eyed Bella looked stunning in a gunmetal grey print wrap dress with a fringed sash belt at the Michael Kors shows on Wednesday.
She grabbed the attention at the Brandon Maxwell show on Tuesday. The 5ft9in head-turned had on a plunging black dress with a high slit up her right leg and strappy heels that made her look ready for the Academy Awards.
Hadid was more understated in a metallic print dress for the Carolina Herrera show on Monday.
More clothes here: The superstar, who calls Kendall Jenner and Hailey Baldwin besties, laid down as she wore a sports bra and short shorts
Drama-rama: The images all were very intense as if they were shot in the middle of the night during a rainstorm in Paris while listening to cabaret singer Edith Piaf

In the August issue of Glamour magazine she said fame was so new to her she didn't know how to take it.
'It’s still weird to me when people ask for pictures. I’m still the same person I was, and I try hard not to change,' she confessed.
And Bella said of her sister Gigi, who dates Pillow Talk hit maker Zayn Malik: 'We’re definitely a lot more similar than people think. Sometimes we’ll finish each other’s sentences, or we’ll be the only people laughing. We’ve always been close.'

Wild patterns: On Thursday, Hadid stormed the catwalk for designer Anna Sui's FW/17 collection at Gallery 1 of Skylight Clarkson Square
